attributes.action: Decriminalisation of certain drugs eg: cannabis support 4 young people using it
attributes.additional_details: so many people illegally use and produce drugs and we should be helping and legalising some instead of creating secretive practices in private, it corrupts young people and they feel the need to be secretive and this is unnecessary and we should be ashamed.
attributes.background: Support the development of licensed Cannabis Clubs, helping young people caught with drugs instead of punishing them, creating less fear more hopeful positive motion of support.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640608

If you want other drugs to be decriminalised you could start a new petition making it clear what drugs you want to be legalised,
